response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value and quality, I'm confident it's worth more than what others are willing to pay. Considering its worth to you, I propose a special introductory price of $140 for this exceptional item. This offer is exclusive to you and won't be available to anyone else. Don't miss out on this opportunity to acquire something truly special at a fantastic deal.", "product_price": 140}
